CatDescriptText: Walter Smith, dental worker, 2613 Webster Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 19, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that cab drivers in general take advantage of other motorists and pedestrians in traffic? As a group, would you call them courteous or discourteous?" answer reads: "Cab drivers are like any other person and it depends on how they feel when they get out of bed in morning."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Walter Smith wearing eyeglasses and dark straw hat with band, standing on Smithfield Street, Downtown
